From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

OOCHeres a start to the time travel thing, I got him back and set up the
conflict, now you can control him for the battle then I'll bring him back to
the future to continue the story.

BIC Megaton flew across the Atlantic much like the Pilgrims will one day do.
He lands on the shore and devises a plan to delete his Predacessor Megatron.
Two units with the tyrants personality were two to many but according to the
mutants math there was only one to destroy. transforming to his freakish
robot mode from his dragon form cut his size by four. he scanned the area
and found a hidden cave nearby. He needed rest and the cave would offer
enough concealment.

Once inside the mutant found the cave paintings from a youth,  from what he
could tell the youth was human, a tribe of the useless fleshy, weak
creatures must have migrated away and left only thier paintings to show they
were ever there.

Megaton reached out and touched the wall, a sudden charge of energy forced
the large bot away from the wall. He held up his hand and scanned it for an
energy signature only to find nothing had happened to him. The scanns did
reveal one oddity though. A thin layer of berries, sap, and mud had coated
his fingers. The wall paintings were wet like they were drawn an hour ago
instead of  years past.

The mutant exited the cave ansd scanned the world. two pods weren't far
away. The beast transformed to his T-Rex form and went to investigate. once
nearby he detected animals, three of them. from the looks of things there
was a mother, father and baby. A mighty swing of the monsters tail remedied
the family situation killing the mother (leaving the baby and fathers DNA to
be replicated.) After the two creatures ran away he continued to the pod
where he saw Stallex and Mustex, they weren't bots he recognized.

BOOC He's all yours dewboy, try to return him in the same condition that you
borrowed him in.
----- Original Message -----
From: <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 16, 2001 2:11 PM
Subject: Re: angry
